data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n h,
  refl,

  rw [
    add_succ 0,
    h
  ],
  refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c hd,
  rw [
    add_zero (a + b),
    add_zero b
  ],
  refl,

  rw [
    add_succ (a + b) c,
    add_succ b c,
    add_succ a (b + c),
    hd
  ],
  refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b h,
  refl,

  rw [
    add_succ,
    h
  ],
  refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction a with a h,
  rw zero_add,
  refl,
  
  rw [
    succ_add,
    add_succ,
    h
  ],
  refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c h,
  rw [
    add_zero (a + b),
    add_zero a
  ],
  refl,

  rw [
    add_succ (a + b) c,
    add_succ a c,
    succ_add (a + c) b,
    h
  ],
  refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=

lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=

(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=

lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u,

(j : Q → T)

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro ipqr,
 intro ipq,
 intro p,
 have q := ipq(p),
 have iqr := ipqr(p),
 have r := iqr(q),
 exact r,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro ipq,
intro iqr,
intro p,
have q := ipq(p),
have r := iqr(q),
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
repeat {rw not_iff_imp_false},
intro ipq,
intro nq,
intro p,
have q := ipq(p),
have boom := nq(q),
exact boom,

example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro Cpq,
cases Cpq with p q,
split,
  exact q,
  
  exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intros Cpq Cqr,
cases Cpq with p q,
have r := Cqr.2,
split,
  exact p,

  exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros Epq Eqr,
cases Epq with Ipq Iqp,
cases Eqr with Iqr Irq,
split,
  intro p,
  exact Iqr (Ipq p),

  intro r,
  exact Iqp (Irq r),

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros Epq Eqr,
cases Epq with Ipq Iqp,
cases Eqr with Iqr Irq,
split,
  intro p,
  exact Iqr (Ipq p),

  intro r,
  exact Iqp (Irq r),

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro Dpq,
cases Dpq with p q,
  right,
  exact p,
  
  left,
  exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
  intro CpDqr,
  cases CpDqr with p Dqr,
  cases Dqr with q r,
    left,
    split,
      exact p,

      exact q,

    right,
    split,
      exact p,

      exact r,

  intro DCpqCpr,
  cases DCpqCpr with Cpq Cpr,
  split,
    exact Cpq.1,

    left,
    exact Cpq.2,

    split,
      exact Cpr.1,

      right,
      exact Cpr.2,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro CpNp,
cases CpNp with p Np,
have b := Np(p),
exfalso,
exact b,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro INqNp,
intro p,
by_cases Hp : P,
by_cases Hq : Q,
  exact Hq,
  have B := (INqNp Hq) p,
  contradiction,

  contradiction,

theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=

theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=

theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :

lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
